title: Our 20 Best Healthy Recipes
description: These main dish recipes have it all -- craveworthy flavor, simple preparations, and they're loaded with healthy whole ingredients. Get recipes and how-to videos

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Our 20 Best Healthy Recipes By Carl Hanson Carl Hanson Carl Hanson is a Senior Editor at Allrecipes who has been writing about food and wine for nearly 20 years. He enjoys creating content that informs, entertains, and assists busy home cooks get nourishing meals on the table for their families. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on June 22, 2021 Close Photo by Chef'd. Looking for healthy dinner ideas? We combed the site for the 20 recipes that have it all -- craveworthy flavor, healthy ingredients, and simple preparations. These delicious main dish recipes are loaded with healthy whole foods. They feature lots of veggies, lean proteins, and healthy fats like olive oil. Actually, the hard part was settling on just twenty. For even more ideas for healthy dinners, take a peek at our collection of Healthy Recipes. Our 20 best healthy recipes 1. Garlic Chicken Stir Fry Strips of skinless chicken breast stir it up with garlic, ginger, and tons of crunchy vegetables, including sliced cabbage, red bell pepper, and sugar snap peas. Toss it with a lightly sweetened soy sauce, and dinner's ready! "This was great because it is so healthy and yet very flavorful," says betsyjane. Gwen adds, "This is delicious, no matter what vegetables I use." Photo by Allrecipes. 2. Lemon-Pepper Salmon Salmon sizzles in the pan with fresh garlic and then simmers briefly with chopped fresh tomatoes and cilantro until the fish is wonderfully flaky. "Excellent for a quick, tasty, healthy meal, with a nice presentation," says dandan14. Photo by Chef'd. 3. Spiralized Cucumber and Jicama Tostada Salad with Avocado Spiralized jicama, cucumber, red onion, and jalapeno peppers combine with sweet bell peppers and grape tomatoes atop a creamy avocado spread. "Change up the veggies or the dressing to suit your taste," suggests bd.weld. Photo by bd.weld. 4. Claire's Curried Butternut Squash Soup This creamy vegan soup replaces dairy with rich coconut milk. It features butternut squash, shallots, curry powder, turmeric, chopped apple, and fresh ginger. "Wow this was good," raves foodelicious. "I loved what fresh ginger did to the flavor of the squash and the apples. Such a great combination." Photo by Leslie Kelly. simple technique for roasting butternut squash 5. Mediterranean Chicken The Mediterranean Diet is all the rage -- and with good reason! It's a simple, delicious way to eat healthy. Here, boneless, skinless chicken breast halves saute in a simple white wine and fresh tomato sauce with olives, onions, garlic, and fresh herbs. New2pc gives it 5 Stars: "We have been eating very healthy lately, and it's great to know that with a few simple ingredients you can get flavor like this. Mmmm, leftovers." Photo by Meredith. 6. Vermicelli Noodle Bowl This simple Vietnamese noodle salad shows off the very best of Vietnamese cooking. Featuring fresh herbs, cucumber, lettuce, carrots, basil, cilantro, bean sprouts, rice vermicelli, and grilled shrimp, tossed with a tangy sweet and sour sauce -- it's full of bright, fresh foods and loaded with exciting tastes and textures. "This is fantastic," raves Tsmunyon. "So healthy, so good." Photo by Allrecipes. 7. Chicken Fiesta Salad This dish explodes with flavors of the Southwest. You'll top salad greens and tomato wedges with seasoned skinless, boneless chicken breast halves sauteed in a little vegetable oil, and then dress it all up with a tasty mixture of black beans, Mexican-style corn, tomato salsa, and fajita seasoning. "This is an attractive and zesty all-in-one dish," says ANGL8277. "It's full of veggies and chicken, and loaded with flavor." 8. Grilled Salmon Steaks with Savory Blueberry Sauce A flavorful fresh blueberry and balsamic vinegar reduction sauce provides the perfect counterpoint to grilled salmon. "This sauce is amazing," says Carolyn. And CDC raves, "My family loved this. I made fresh string beans and put the sauce on both the salmon and the beans. Very good and healthy too!" Grilled Salmon and Blueberry Sauce | Photo by Meredith. 9. Chicken, Zucchini, and Artichoke Salad Pieces of skinless, boneless chicken breast are lightly pan-fried and tossed with sauteed zucchini, garbanzo beans, olives, and artichoke hearts. "I made up this salad because our garden is simply overflowing with zucchini," says homecookingtheworldover. Zucchini and Artichoke Salad | Photo by naples34102. 10. Sorghum Buddha Bowl There's so much healthy stuff happening in this vegetarian bowl. Roasted radicchio, Brussels sprouts, butternut squash, jalapenos, and leeks mix it up with black beans, sesame seeds, and a tangy miso-based dressing. It's a filling vegetarian meal-in-a-bowl! Photo by Buckwheat Queen. 11. Ratatouille This classic Mediterranean dish is loaded with healthy fresh vegetables, including zucchini, fresh tomatoes, eggplant, mushrooms, bell peppers, and onions. "Wonderfully simple, healthy, and delicious," says LITHRAI. "Makes the house smell awesome!" IbanezLover raves, "It was the best-tasting healthy food I have ever had." 12. Cauliflower Rice and Beans Fajita Bowls In this healthy Tex-Mex bowl, seasoned riced cauliflower, red bell peppers, red onions, and garlic are roasted and topped with pinto beans, cotija cheese, pepitas, and fresh cilantro. "Serve bowls topped with pico de gallo, guacamole, and sour cream," says Julie Hubert. Photo by Julie Hubert. 13. Vegetarian Kale Soup This hearty vegetarian soup features cannellini beans, green kale, fresh tomatoes, and potatoes. "Healthy. Easy. Inexpensive. Super yummy," raves TRINITY7. "Does it get any better?" Photo by The Gruntled Gourmand. 14. Black Bean Breakfast Bowl Quality proteins and healthy fats will power you through the day! This quick and healthy breakfast bowl pairs scrambled eggs with microwaved black beans plus sliced avocado and salsa. "A delicious, healthy, and filling breaky bowl -- and vegetarian friendly," raves megfranc. "I love this one." Photo by Sherri. 15. Grilled Cod with Spinach and Tomatoes Seasoned cod fillets are grilled in foil packs along with spinach, tomato, onions, olive oil, and balsamic vinegar. This healthy meal is on the table in about 20 minutes. "Great, tasty, and oh-so-simple," says lisasayegh. "I doubled the fresh spinach and used fresh minced garlic." Photo by Kgora. 16. White Chili II Cubes of skinless, boneless chicken breast are quickly pan fried and combined with sauteed onion, red and yellow bell peppers, jalapeno peppers, garlic, and seasonings. Then you'll simply simmer the chicken and veggies with great Northern beans in chicken broth. "A fantastic chili with enough bite to be flavorful and pleasing, and low enough in fat and sodium to be allowed on my diet," says END54. Photo by Allrecipes Magazine. 17. Grilled Chicken Fajita Salad Grilled marinated strips of skinless, boneless chicken breast top romaine lettuce, red bell peppers, and onion. "Garnish this low-carb, no-sweat, sizzling-hot grilled fajita salad with lime wedges and chopped cilantro," says Baking Nana. Photo by bd.weld. 18. Veracruz-Style Red Snapper This classic Gulf Coast fish dish bursts with vibrant flavors. It features capers, cherry tomatoes, green olives, and jalapenos. "Excellent recipe," raves Sidekick. "Quick, healthy, and so tasty." The recipe calls for red snapper, but any flaky white fish will work here. 19. Grilled Chicken Salad with Seasonal Fruit This healthy main dish salad features grilled skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, toasted pecans, Bibb lettuce, fresh strawberries, and a tangy dressing of red wine vinegar, olive oil, minced onion, and mustard. "Oh, MY! This was absolutely delightful," says cliff. "When you take a bite with bits of everything, the explosion of flavor in your mouth is pure ecstasy." Photo by Maisan Djuhadi. 20. Creamy Italian White Bean Soup A creamy soup without the cream. White kidney beans, minced garlic, and fresh spinach, and a splash of bright lemon juice steal the show in this simple, satisfying soup. "Loved this," says Skatkat. "A hearty, healthy, and delicious recipe. It was simple and easy to prep and overall a fast and delicious meal, especially for a week night!" Photo by larkspur. Want more healthy meal ideas? Check out our collection of Healthy Recipes. Explore more: Recipes Healthy Recipes Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
